title: TFR Ep. 563: Pig, The Tomorrow War, TFR Libs
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss the anti-John Wick non-revenge film ‘Pig’, featuring Mr. “Yes, I’ll Do It” Nicholas Cage.  A man who doesn’t know how to say no to any project, sometimes may find the diamond in the rough. Could this be one of those times…?  Then it’s on the Amazon Prime sci-fi actioner, ‘The Tomorrow War’.  Chris Pratt leads a fight against aliens. In the FUTURE!  So why has Chris Pratt’s favor begun to fall as he is now regularly dead last in the Hollywood Chris’s ranking.  There’s the getting entirely too long review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  Then Matt and Chris close out the show with everyone’s favorite fill-in-the-blank game, TFR Libs.  

00:00-08:41: Intro/Pig

08:42-22:53: Physical Media Picks

22:54-36:42: The Tomorrow War

36:43-58:04: TFR Libs

58:05-59:41: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

itunes:summary:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss the anti-John Wick non-revenge film ‘Pig’, featuring Mr. “Yes, I’ll Do It” Nicholas Cage.  A man who doesn’t know how to say no to any project, sometimes may find the diamond in the rough. Could this be one of those times…?  Then it’s on the Amazon Prime sci-fi actioner, ‘The Tomorrow War’.  Chris Pratt leads a fight against aliens. In the FUTURE!  So why has Chris Pratt’s favor begun to fall as he is now regularly dead last in the Hollywood Chris’s ranking.  There’s the getting entirely too long review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  Then Matt and Chris close out the show with everyone’s favorite fill-in-the-blank game, TFR Libs.
